script:
#!/bin/bash
 echo "$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S.%3N'): running RELION job on host $(hostname -s) with job ID ${SLURM_JOB_ID:-(SLURM_JOB_ID not set)}"
source /etc/profile.d/modules.sh
module load EM/relion/4.0-slurm 2> /dev/null
module load ccp4
 module load dials
 xia2 image=NEXUS_FILE_PATH goniometer.axis=0,-1,0 dials.fix_distance=True dials.masking.d_max=9 
unset SLURM_JWT
echo "$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S.%3N'): job finished"
